```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # 加上預設的地圖資料
  addMarkers(
    lng=120.2858, lat=22.6266,
    label = "高市勞檢處") %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng=c(120.2839, 120.3018,120.2858), 
    lat=c(22.6251, 22.6346,22.6266),
    color="red",stroke = TRUE,
    label =c("鹽埕埔捷運站(橘線)","美麗島捷運站","高市勞檢處"),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE,textsize = "12px",
                                style = list(
        "color" = "black",
        "box-shadow" = "3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)",
        "border-color" = "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"
      ))) 

map  # 繪製地圖22.625127622968208, 120.28390372187799
```
